QuestData.Title: Scouting the Crimson Thicket
QuestData.Description: If you are heading east, there is something I would ask of you.$b$bWhile we struck camp some of our caravan left to scout around the city. Lilryia Dawnwind has been gone too long.$b$bI would be most grateful if you would go check on her safety. She said she was going to scout out the ruins of Dawncleft.
QuestData.RewardText: You could not have arrived at a better time, $r.
